ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know if that bard is the same as me.  i know i can fear kite or chant kite a melee class and win a duel.  the only reason i duel is for fun, and it s
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know if that bard is the same as me. i know i can fear kite or
chant kite a melee class and win a duel. the only reason i duel is for fun,
and it's fun for me to test out my melee abilities and songs to see how i
can stack up against a melee class. sure i can take out casters pretty
easily most of the time but the most fun i have is trying to beat a melee
ability by standing up to them. i can come pretty close with rangers and
less-than great equipped warriors. i just love killing rogues and am very
good at it. monks are just scary though hehe. this was mostly at 50, the
51+ disciplines make the rogues, monks, and warriors downright impossible,
but i still try for fun. i personally refuse to kite in duels. i know i
can win but it's not as fun =) now if that 54 bard thought he could win, i
understand your point. i never expect to win melee duels against melee
classes, but hell if i will run from them!

Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> I know a level 54 bard on my server (who will remain unnamed)
> who lost a
> duel to a level 55 monk of all things. 3 times in a row he lost. He
> absolutely refused to listen to me when I tried to tell him
> how to more
> effectively fight. The fool kept trying to melee.
